alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Roseau; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 11:58AM CST until December 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches, some areas may see higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Roseau, Lake Of The Woods, North Beltrami, North Clearwater and South Beltrami Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy snow rates will significantly reduce visibility Thursday. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commutes Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Roseau; South Beltrami
